content.raw:
Sorry to bring bad news, but for us this made the robot more unstable.

These last few days I ran 41 tests of task 1 (walk to valve, fix pitch, fix yaw, walk to exit), the robot completed all those 41 successfully.

Yesterday I tried with this branch, and ran 13 tests, it collapsed on 3 of those 13 while operating the valve. While the sampling isn't that great, to me it looks like it's less stable, and we've spent too much time tuning our code to work with the quirks of the current simulation.


Edit: I'll be running more tests today on the default branch, just in case the switch to 0.6.0 messed up something for me.
